title: Arsenal vs Aston Villa, Premier League LIVE: Score, goals and latest updates from the Emirates
text:
Arsenal look to boost their top four credentials at home to Aston Villa.

The Gunners picked up a morale-boosting win against Frankfurt midweek in the Europa League, bouncing back from their collapse against Watford.

While Villa were frustrated by 10-man West Ham last time out.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

10 mins to kick off. Can Arsenal move back into the top four with a win? Arsenal will need to improve on their last league game, a 2-2 draw at Watford where defeat looked likely despite having been two goals up. Aubameyang is chasing the golden boot once again this season. A hat trick today would take him level with Aguero on eight. Aston Villa will be looking to move out of the relegation zone. Their only league win came against Everton just under a month ago. Advertisement Lacazette injured, but Aubameyang and 18 year old Saka produced the goods in Germany on Thursday. The latter an exciting prospect. Another big day for him against Villa. Aston Villa: Heaton Guilbert Engels Mings Taylor Nakamba McGinn Grealish El Ghazi Trezeguet Wesley Arsenal: Leno Maitland-Niles David Luiz Sokratis Kolasinac Xhaka Guendouzi Ceballos Pepe Aubameyang Saka Just under an hour before Arsenal take on Aston Villa... Here's our preview. Advertisement Welcome to The Independent's live coverage of Arsenal vs Aston Villa. Unai Emery will hope Arsenal can reaffirm their top four credentials at home to Aston Villa. The Gunners were undone by Watford last weekend but bounced back in the Europa League midweek to breeze past Frankfurt.

description: Arsenal look to boost their top four credentials at home to Aston Villa.  The Gunners picked up a morale-boosting win against Frankfurt midweek in the Europa League, bouncing back from their collapse against Watford.  While Villa were frustrated by 10-man West Ham last time out.
